name: Teooh
slogan: Platform for Organizing Virtual Reality Events
description:
TEOOH is a platform for hosting Virtual Events. 

From panel discussions to business conferences, host or attend any event in just a few clicks. 

Our aim is to become the easiest and most powerful way to engage global audiences, by allowing communities across the world to attend events and interact as they would do in the physical world, without the hassle of travelling or finding venues.

For more information, please visit www.teooh.com.

jobs.title: Business Development + Sales Intern
jobs.description:
Job Title: Business Development + Sales Intern

Location: London (No remote)

Department: Sales Department 

Reports To:
* Don Stein, CEO (https://www.linkedin.com/in/donstein). 
* Don previously started a venture-capital fund in San Francisco, California. He’s hosted 50 events, invested in 30 startups, and has raised millions of dollars for multiple companies he has co-founded. He is now the CEO of Teooh.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Opportunity: 
Teooh is a high-growth venture backed startup built in Silicon Valley. Teooh is poised to become one of the fastest growing and most unique companies in the world thanks to a world class team of entrepreneurs, developers, and investors. Our team values giving full autonomy to each employee to complete their responsibilities, this means you will take full ownership over your division of the company and are expected to deliver high quality results as we continue to become an iconic startup company. 

Job Summary:
The most important skill in both business and life is the ability to get on phone calls and sell yourself or sell products. If you can master this skill, then you can capture any opportunity and persuade anyone to do nearly anything. On a daily basis you will be expected to reach out to potential customers, and move them through the pipeline so they eventually become dedicated customers who love our company. You’re expected to cold message potential customers, schedule meetings, and then give each customer a product demo. You will have full control over your daily hours, and you’ll be measured on the number of new customers you can generate per week. 

Expected Deliverables: 
* Generating new customer leads on a weekly basis
* Sending 100’s of cold emails
* Speaking with 100’s of customers about their needs
* Making sales and generating revenue
* Giving product demo’s to potential customers 

Lessons:
* Cold Emails: You’ll be expected to generate new business with daily emailing 
* People Skills: You’ll be talking with new people on a daily basis
* Network: You’ll be networking, socializing, and shadowing our CEO as you speak to Silicon Valley insiders
* Sales Skills: You’ll be expected to understand our business model, identify potential customers, and close revenue
* Conversational Skills: You’re going to be talking to a lot of cool people, you’ll be trained on the art of story-telling. 
* ‘How to Win Friends and Influence People’

Qualifications: 

Hard Skills:
* Cold messaging (Gmail, Mailchimp, LinkedIn InMessage)
* Tracking Sales Pipeline (Monday.com, HubSpot, CRM’s)
* Generating Revenue (Stripe, Invoicing)

Soft Skills:
* Charismatic 
* Funny
* Sweet 
* Cool
* Motivated to become a CRO, CSO, or CEO

Company Description: 
Teooh is a venture-backed startup founded in Silicon Valley, but now operated in London. Teooh has acquired a world-class group of investors like General Catalyst, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Betaworks, and many other notable Silicon Valley based Venture Capitalists. The Teooh mission is to remove physical barriers from attending events and meeting the right people, bringing people all across the world closer together. 

Teooh is a virtual reality company where brands use Teooh Venue’s to host online events. Organizers schedule and plan their event using custom software, plus invite attendee’s using a unique RSVP system. Attendees arrive to the virtual venue as an avatar, and then control their character similar to a video game. Each attendee has the opportunity to customize their avatar character, and can then attend different panels, speeches, and socialize just like at a real-life event. 

* Website: www.Teooh.com
* Visual Example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TrHTLGIi9gs

jobs.title: Event Organizer Intern
jobs.description:
Job Title: Event Organizer Intern 

Location: London (No remote)

Department: Marketing Department 

Reports To:
* Don Stein, CEO (https://www.linkedin.com/in/donstein). 
* Don previously started a venture-capital fund in San Francisco, California. He’s hosted 50 events, invested in 30 startups, and has raised millions of dollars for multiple companies he has co-founded. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Opportunity: 
Teooh is a high-growth venture backed startup built in Silicon Valley. Teooh is poised to become one of the fastest growing and most unique companies in the world thanks to a world class team of entrepreneurs, developers, and investors. Our team values giving full autonomy to each employee to complete their responsibilities, this means you will take full ownership over your division of the company and are expected to deliver high quality results as we continue to become an iconic startup company. 

Job Summary:
The most important factor when building a startup in 2020 is to build a strong community. The best way to create a passionate community is to organize events and provide them a platform to socialize and meet each other. We are looking for someone who has the ability to create an event company internally, we are calling this initiative Teooh Talks (similar concept to TED Talks). On a daily basis you’ll be expected to think of event concepts, work with our CEO to get in contact with important people who can sit on stage and give presentations. You’ll then promote the event and gain 150 RSVP’s from bloggers, influencers, potential customers, and other perfect people who are interested to attend. You’ll be organizing events, scheduling the agenda, working with speakers to help them prepare, and you’ll be inviting people to the event. On the day of the event, you’re expected to be there and ensure it runs smoothly. 

Expected Deliverables: 
* Host a monthly event of up to 100 attendees
* Interview important people on stage
* Promote each event and acquire 150+ RSVP’s
* Plan content for each event
* Organize and execute a timely agenda for the event 

Lessons:
You’ll learn…
* Event management: You’ll be solely responsible for the success of the events your organize and host
* Managing people: You’ll be expected to organize hundreds of people to ensure they enjoy the event
* Event moderating: You’ll learn the skills and confidence to speak in front of a room of people
* Social: You’ll be talking to hundreds of people each month, and this requires someone who’s charming

Qualifications: 

Hard Skills:
* Organizing RSVP’s (HubSpot, EventBrite, Meetup)
* Selling Tickets (EventBrite, Meetup, Facebook)
* Event Management (Control the event, Manage volunteers) 
* Event Organizing (Landing pages, Speaker preparation)

Soft Skills:
* Organized
* Scheduled 
* Demanding 
* Motivated to become a CMO, CEO, or Event Lead

Company Description: 
Teooh is a venture-backed startup founded in Silicon Valley, but now operated in London. Teooh has acquired a world-class group of investors like General Catalyst, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Betaworks, and many other notable Silicon Valley based Venture Capitalists. The Teooh mission is to remove physical barriers from attending events and meeting the right people, bringing people all across the world closer together. 

Teooh is a virtual reality company where brands use Teooh Venue’s to host online events. Organizers schedule and plan their event using custom software, plus invite attendee’s using a unique RSVP system. Attendees arrive to the virtual venue as an avatar, and then control their character similar to a video game. Each attendee has the opportunity to customize their avatar character, and can then attend different panels, speeches, and socialize just like at a real-life event. 

* Website: www.Teooh.com
* Visual Example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TrHTLGIi9gs

jobs.title: Marketing + Design Intern
jobs.description:
Job Title: Marketing + Design Intern

Location: London (No remote)

Department: Marketing Department 

Reports To:
* Don Stein, CEO (https://www.linkedin.com/in/donstein)
* Don previously started a venture-capital fund in San Francisco, California. He’s hosted 50 events, invested in 30 startups, and has raised millions of dollars for multiple companies he has co-founded. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Opportunity: 
Teooh is a high-growth venture backed startup built in Silicon Valley. Teooh is poised to become one of the fastest growing and most unique companies in the world thanks to a world class team of entrepreneurs, developers, and investors. Our team values giving full autonomy to each employee to complete their responsibilities, this means you will take full ownership over your division of the company and are expected to deliver high quality results as we continue to become an iconic startup company. 

Job Summary:
A quality product needs quality marketing. You’ll be taking ownership over our marketing and leading our strategic campaigns. On a daily basis you will be managing our social accounts, writing blog posts, editing videos, managing contractors, and releasing marketing materials to our customers and followers. You’re expected to be a self-starter who can deliver quality materials on a strict schedule. You will have full control over your job, and you’ll be treated as if you are an entrepreneur starting a division within our company. This role requires someone who dreams of one day becoming a CMO, or starting their own company. 

Expected Deliverables: 
* Consistent posts to social media
* Consistent press releases 
* Design marketing materials
* Release promotional videos

Lessons:
You’ll learn…
* Network: You’ll be meeting, charming, and interacting with important people on a weekly basis
* Teamwork: You’ll be in direct contact with our CEO and our business team
* Startup Culture: You’ll be working in a relaxed environment driven by goals and deadlines
* Venture Capital: You’ll learn how startups frame their company in preparation for VC funding
* Sales: You’ll learn the importance of tracking KPI metrics and converting marketing into revenue
* Time Management: We use Sprint Methodologies for organizing and accomplishing our goals 
* PR: You’ll be writing press releases and building up your contacts in the world of PR

Qualifications: 

Hard Skills:
* Photo Editing (Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Lightroom, Etc..)
* Video Editing (Adobe Premier, Final Cut, Adobe Premiere Elements, Etc…)
* Video Capture (Unity, Screen Capture, Product Screenshots, Etc…)
* Manage Social Accounts (Buffer, HootSuite, TweetDeck, Etc…)
* Copywriting (Medium, Substack, SEO keywords, Etc…)

Soft Skills:
* Funny
* Creative
* Quirky 
* Motivated to become a CMO or CEO 

Company Description: 

Teooh is a venture-backed startup founded in Silicon Valley, but now operated in London. Teooh has acquired a world-class group of investors like General Catalyst, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Betaworks, and many other notable Silicon Valley based Venture Capitalists. The Teooh mission is to remove physical barriers from attending events and meeting the right people, bringing people all across the world closer together. 

Teooh is a virtual reality company where brands use Teooh Venue’s to host online events. Organizers schedule and plan their event using custom software, plus invite attendee’s using a unique RSVP system. Attendees arrive to the virtual venue as an avatar, and then control their character similar to a video game. Each attendee has the opportunity to customize their avatar character, and can then attend different panels, speeches, and socialize just like at a real-life event. 

* Website: www.Teooh.com
* Visual Example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TrHTLGIi9gs
